recipesJson.name: Tart & Sour Strawberry Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: MarkSr
recipesJson.description: Tart and Sour along with the Liquid Amber will take the Strawberries on a journey of experimentation of itself, It will create a juicy yet sour dance on your tongue.. The cheesecakes will bring up the rear of the flavor to balance it all out with the creams. This is an overall enjoyable vape with highs and lows of the Strawberries as well as the Tart and Sour.
